LanguageData.MSMedicalMat.label: Medical Mats
LanguageData.MSMedicalMat.description: Grants the ability to make Medical Mats. A rolled up portable mat that can be used for medical purposes in the field or as a useful caravan item.
LanguageData.MSMedicalMatSpacer.label: Advanced Medical Mats
LanguageData.MSMedicalMatSpacer.description: Grants the ability to make Advanced Medical Mats. A rolled up advanced portable mat that can be used for medical purposes in the field or as a useful caravan item.
LanguageData.MSMedicalMatUltra.label: Ultra Medical Mats
LanguageData.MSMedicalMatUltra.description: Grants the ability to make Ultratech Medical Mats. A rolled up high-tech portable mat that can be used for medical purposes in the field or as a useful caravan item.
LanguageData.MSMedicalMatEarly.label: Early Medical Mats
LanguageData.MSMedicalMatEarly.description: Grants the ability to make early Medical Mats. A rolled up portable mat made from herbal medicine impregnated rope that can be used for medical purposes in the field or as a useful caravan item.
